# Solidity API

## IWstEth

### wrap

```solidity
function wrap(uint256 _stEthAmount) external returns (uint256)
```

### unwrap

```solidity
function unwrap(uint256 _wstEthAmount) external returns (uint256)
```

### stEthPerToken

```solidity
function stEthPerToken() external view returns (uint256)
```
